description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller with several endpoints including a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info. It leverages annotations for API documentation and request mappings.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the notesbackend application, including greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and information endpoint.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the application's health status as 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
